mapper.insert:
select seq_reply.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_reply(rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate) values (#{rno}, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
